channel.title: Helpp needed please! please look at this
channel.description:
Hey can some one help me please, i need to change the stance of a custom weapon basicly i have a custom wep and its really cool but i want to hold it like a 2h i want it to be resting on my shoulder so can any1 help i has already added the wep and it wrks just need help changing the stance
this is the link for the weapon download and there a pik too its not my wep btw-[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,389353.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,389353.0.html[/url] it has something on this link how to do it but i dont understand it so can any1 help me plz. looks likw this [img]http://i767.photobucket.com/albums/xx316/prakzy/Project0002CourageClient.png[/img] want it to look like this [img]http://i767.photobucket.com/albums/xx316/prakzy/29ymjrd.png[/img]
